name: capstone
description: A full-stack MERN application for tracking library books, allowing users to manage book inventory, check book availability, and track borrowing status. The application includes a frontend built with React for the user interface and a backend server using Express for handling database interactions. Book data is stored in MongoDB, providing a scalable and efficient solution for managing library collections.

scripts.setup: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ..

author: William Cessor
